page.title: 08Family Life - Weekdays.
page.content: Every morning I wake up at 7o'clock.Everybody is downstairs by 7.45am to breakfast.Usually we have museli and toast for breakfast but sometimes we have a cereal such as Cornflakes or Wheatabix.Mum goes to work every morning at 8.15am, she works as a Secretary at Derriford Health Authority.My brother Richard goes to Ivybridge Comprehensive School at 8.OOam.I go to Shaugh Prior Primary School at 9.OOam and come home at 3.3Opm. Richard comes in at 4.15p.m. and Mum at 5.15pm. I usually do some jobs before tea such as cleaning out my hamster,feeding the dog and tidying my room.We have tea whilst watching the news on television,then Dad,Richard and I wash up whilst Mum prepres packed lunches for the next day.We then all watch Television until we go to bed.
